body:
He does it for two reasons, one to try to get a quick bounty for technically uploading scans of something someone wanted, the second is to sell the raws at higher resolution and keep them hostage while reporting anyone uploading better copies. 
Shit's annoying really and tends to get flagged on sad panda a lot but he just doesn't give a damn.
@fireunknown27 Yeah, I second that. It's fucking unreadable.

This guy always spam this, then say "scan it yourself".
nhentai should block this uploader.
